tool_description: The Product Reviews API returns product reviews for virtually any product on the planet. Simply supply a search term, manufacturer part number or upc in the query parameter.
name: Product Reviews
title: Product Reviews

api_list.name: Get Reviews
api_list.description: This is the primary endpoint for requesting reviews.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search term for the product. This can be a keyword, title, mpn, upc or any other desired search query.
